channel.title: How to put my server online? Plz help me!
channel.description: I have downloaded a 317 Erasedpk client+source. Where do I change the ip address, in client.java. But there is a client.javafile in my client and in my source. Do I change my ip in clientsided or source-sided. Do I put my computers ip or my no ip hostname?????

item.title: How to put my server online? Plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

for client go to client.java search for gui.server u’ll see something like this

if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http:\\gui.server" + (43594 + anInt958)); }
change the red color to ur ip

Read full topic
item.source: How to put my server online? Plz help me!

item.title: How to put my server online? Plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

No. Think of it like a tree. The roots are the server, and the branches are the clients all tailored to fit that one tree.

If you need any more specific help, let me know. I’ll go through it with you step by step. Once you know once, you can do it again and again.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put my server online? Plz help me!

item.title: How to put my server online? Plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

coolguy12123:

yea, but when I look it up, there are two results; public server string server =, and just server = 127.0.0.1, which do I change, both or only server= for the client sided?

Change the “127.0.0.1” to your No-IP.

Read full topic
